paragraph.heading: 2Requirements

row.cell: PC with 300 MHz or higher Pentium II class processor or equivalent recommended (single or dual processor system)
Windows NT/2000/XP/2003 (.NET support is for Microsoft Windows 2000, XP and 2003 only.)
256 Mb of RAM or higher (512Mb recommended)

250Mb uncompressed hard disk space (500Mb recommended). Hard disk space requirements will vary depending on configuration; custom installation choices may require more or less space. Space required for installation of the Microsoft .NET Framework will also be required.
CD-ROM drive (not required for Free Edition downloads)
Super VGA (800 x 600) or higher resolution video adapter and monitor
Keyboard and mouse or compatible pointing device

paragraph.heading: 2Installing the Free Edition
paragraph.paragraph: After downloading the Eiffel55.msi installation package, right click on it and select Install. This will launch the installation procedure. Follow the steps indicated in the dialogs to complete the installation.
paragraph.heading: 2Installing the University Edition
paragraph.paragraph: Insert the CD into your CD-ROM drive. If you have the autorun facility enabled then the installation process will automatically be launched. Otherwise you can launch it by right clicking on the file Eiffel55_university.msi and selecting Install. Follow the steps indicated in the dialogs to complete the installation.
paragraph.heading: 2Installing the Enterprise Edition
paragraph.paragraph: Insert the CD into your CD-ROM drive. If you have the autorun facility enabled then the installation process will automatically be launched. Otherwise you can launch it by executing setup.exe located at the root of the CD. A dialog asking for your username and CD-key should appear as below:

Enter the information you received upon ordering your copy of EiffelStudio Enterprise Edition. Once the information is correct, the Next button will be enabled. Click Next and follow the steps indicated in the dialogs to complete the installation.
Once installed, the first time you launch EiffelStudio, you will be asked for an activation key through the following dialog:

By clicking on the http://activate.eiffel.comhttp://activate.eiffel.com URL a new web browser will appear with the requested fields automatically filled in with the appropriate information. Simply click Activate and a new page with an activation code will appear. Copy and paste the activation code in the first field and the Activate button should be enabled to let you activate your copy.
You can activate your copy up to three times. Once you have reached this threshold and need to reinstall your copy, contact Eiffel Software to request one more activation.
paragraph.heading: 2.NET Support
paragraph.paragraph: To enable .NET support in EiffelStudio, it is necessary to install the Microsoft .NET Framework prior to starting the installation of EiffelStudio. EiffelStudio currently supports versions 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework. Partial support for the .NET Framework 2.0 beta has been added in this version of EiffelStudio.
paragraph.heading: 2What about Windows 95/98 and Me?
paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio will not run on Windows 95.EiffelStudio will run on Windows 98 and Windows Me. EiffelStudio generated code runs on Windows 98/Me/NT/2000/XP and 2003.
